amendment.description: Add at the end the following new section: SEC. 12. SUNSET. This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall terminate on the date that is seven years after the date of the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 114-88 to sunset provisions of the bill after 7 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 313 - 110 (Roll no. 168).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 313 - 110 (Roll no. 168).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
